body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management        The White Pass & Yukon Route Railway administration building is home to Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park's administrative offices and museum. NPS photo   Â     Welcome to the Management Page. This is where you will find the park's planning documents as well as environmental assessments for current projects and other guiding documents. If you don't find what you are looking for, please contact us to request other information or reference materials. Some of the park's sustainability efforts Working toward 2016.  Projects for the National Park Service's 100th birthday Commercial use authorization for tour operators within the park.
title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Management
